extension.name: eMundus - Registration email
extension.author: Hugo Moracchini
extension.description: A plugin which sends an email on new user creation containing a registration link.

field.name: email
field.label: Email to send
field.description: The ID or lbl of the email to be sent contaning the registration URL. Put [ACTIVATION_URL] in the email to add the link.

field.name: activation_redirect
field.label: Redirect after activation.
field.description: The URL to go to on successful activation.
